vialab.SMT.event

Interface SwipeKeyListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwipeKeyboard

    public interface SwipeKeyListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    The interface for recieving swipe key events. Not to be confused with recieving swipe keyboard events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void swipeEnded(SwipeKeyEvent swipeKeyEvent)
      Invoked when a swipe has finished on a swipe key
      void swipeHit(SwipeKeyEvent swipeKeyEvent)
      Invoked when a swipe has hit a swipe key
      void swipeStarted(SwipeKeyEvent swipeKeyEvent)
      Invoked when a swipe has been started on a swipe key
